titleStmt.title: Neural Network Visualization 465 NEURAL NETWORK VISUALIZATION

affiliation.orgName: IB M Research T.J. Watson Research Center Yorktown Heights NY
IB M Research T.J. Watson Research Center Yorktown Heights NY

analytic.title: Neural Network Visualization 465 NEURAL NETWORK VISUALIZATION

abstract.p: We have developed graphics to visualize static and dynamic information in layered neural network learning systems. Emphasis was placed on creating new visuals that make use of spatial arrangements , size information, animation and color. We applied these tools to the study of back-propagation learning of simple Boolean predicates, and have obtained new insights into the dynamics of the learning process.
